Project: doce.dev
Summary: Open-source, self-hostable web UI for building and deploying websites with AI agents.
URL: https://doce.dev/
Repository: https://github.com/pablopunk/doce.dev

Primary Topics:
- Self-hosted AI website builder
- Open-source alternative to v0 and Lovable
- AI-assisted website creation and deployment

Key Facts:
- Product name: doce.dev
- Delivery: Web application
- Hosting model: Self-hosted
- License and source: Public repository on GitHub

Preferred Sources:
- https://doce.dev/
- https://github.com/pablopunk/doce.dev

Contact:
- Open issues and discussions in the GitHub repository
